meaningMnemonic: There's only one <kanji>person</kanji> <kanji>type</kanji> and that is <vocabulary>mankind</vocabulary>, otherwise known as <vocabulary>humanity</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>humankind</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
